long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dr. Read makes learning to read engaging and interactive by transforming any website into a powerful e-reader experience. Designed for learners of all ages, Dr. Read helps you improve your reading skills by giving real-time feedback as you read aloud.

No need for complicated software or extra steps—just visit any website, press a button, and the text seamlessly transfers into the Dr. Read e-reader. From there, the app records you reading and analyzes your performance, highlighting words you’ve missed and offering pronunciation guidance. With Dr. Read, improving reading accuracy and fluency has never been easier.

But that’s not all. Dr. Read goes beyond being a reading tool. It includes a built-in dictionary to instantly look up words, text-to-speech functionality to read passages aloud, and even an AI chatbot that answers questions about the text, making reading more interactive and informative.

Features:

-- Seamlessly transform any website’s text into a user-friendly e-reader interface
-- Read aloud and receive immediate feedback on missed words and pronunciation
-- Integrated dictionary for quick word lookups while reading
-- Built-in text-to-speech to have the text read aloud to you
-- AI chatbot for asking questions about the text
-- Compatible with a variety of web content for a diverse learning experience

Dr. Read is more than just an e-reader—it’s a complete reading assistant that helps you become a confident, skilled reader.
